com.tilisty.models

Class TiViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tilisty.models.AbstractModel
      • com.tilisty.models.TiViewModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObservable, IObserver

    public class TiViewModel
extends AbstractModel
implements IObserver
    TiViewModel is responsible for managing it's own properties and other things to do with TiView's which are passed in to the class.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Jason Simpson
